functions.name: dms_instance_public_access_enabled
functions.description: Checks if DMS instance public access is enabled.

functions.name: dms_instance_public_access_disabled
functions.description: Checks if DMS instance public access is disabled.

functions.name: dms_endpoints_ssl_connection_configured
functions.description: Checks if DMS endpoints have SSL connection configured.

functions.name: dms_redis_endpoint_tls_encryption_enabled
functions.description: Checks if Redis endpoint TLS encryption is enabled for DMS.

functions.name: dms_replication_task_logging_severity_enabled
functions.description: Checks if replication task logging severity is enabled for DMS.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Database_Migration_Service API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
